Articles.Content:
Uhm, what do I say true or false to?

The user below me knows where I live.

True, I am the hitman. please remain still.

The user below me is fascinated by the idea of a cyborg hitman.

True, mainly because you are under the control of Chobit.

The user below knows that Rage is under the control of Chobit.

True

The user below me is disturbed by being stalked by a hitman.

True!

The user below me is not me.

True...or so you think...[ASSIMILATE]

The user below me is an organic life form that is utterly pathetic compared to myself.

False, its the other way around.

The user below me agrees.

Negatory. [Exterminate:Auth-C:c-387]

The user below me is a target.

Negative.

The person below me is a Cyborg Post Sniper, lives in a pool of molten metal and is the GIF master.

...Perhaps...

The user below me is an animal of some sort.

True. Homo Sapiens Sapiens.

User below me is a liquid.

True, rocket fuel to be exact.

The user below me is a solid.

True and False. While most of my primary components are solid there is still liquid coolant coursing through me.

The user below me is currently like: Wat?

Yep.

The user below me is a little scared by Rage097's half-robot-ness.

Nope. *tilts head* I find your irrational fear amusing.

The user below me is gonna be this guy again^^^

nope.

the user below me was born

Ummm... when?

The next user could be more specific so that I don't get confused.

True, he meant that you weren't built but born.

The user below me is attracted to my avatar and wants me to post a larger pic of it.

Half true, i wanna see what it is before i'm attracted to it

The user below me has set foot on Minmus at least 2 times

True...and here:

The user below me has brown eyes.

True, though sometimes they turn green.

The user below me has played Don't Starve.

False, they're Purple

The user below me laughed.

False because you were sniped and it makes you post look out of place.

The user below me has been sniped by me at least once.

Yep, more than once.

Tat usar belaw mey's alllike, face-to-dat-deskuh-broteb.

Your words are half-understandable, and FALSE.

The next user speaks in German accent. (Doesn't necessary what language you are speaking, just speak in German accent!)
